attributes.action: Parliament to vote to stop strikes on Syria and find a diplomatic solution.
attributes.additional_details: We are continuously told we are short or finances in our country to help our struggling pensioners, our schools, hospitals, police force and the fire brigade. How did we have the money for these air strikes? I believe that every person in Britain would agree the money would be better spent in our own country helping our struggling public services.
attributes.background:
The money could be better spent on the police force, the fire brigade, schools and hospitals.

The air strikes that were recently made were not voted for by parliament and I believe were legally questionable. 
We need to be leading the peace talks to get to a diplomatic solution.
